verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

If a soul <S%H5315><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and commit <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and lie <S%H3584><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto his neighbour <S%H5997><s%> in that which was delivered <S%H6487><s%> him to keep, or in fellowship <S%H8667><s%> <S%H3027><s%>, or in a thing taken away by violence <S%H1498><s%>, or hath deceived <S%H6231><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his neighbour <S%H5997><s%>;

Or have found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that which was lost <S%H9><s%>, and lieth <S%H3584><s%> <S%H8765><s%> concerning it, and sweareth <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%>; in any <S%H259><s%> of all these that a man <S%H120><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, sinning <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> therein <S%H2007><s%>:

Then it shall be, because he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and is guilty <S%H816><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that he shall restore <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> that <S%H1500><s%> which he took violently away <S%H1497><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, or the thing <S%H6233><s%> which he hath deceitfully gotten <S%H6231><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, or that which was delivered <S%H6487><s%> <S%H853><s%> him to keep <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8717><s%>, or the lost thing <S%H9><s%> which he found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%>,

Or all that about which he hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8735><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%>; he shall even restore <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it in the principal <S%H7218><s%>, and shall add <S%H3254><s%> the fifth part <S%H2549><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thereto, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it unto him to whom it appertaineth, in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his trespass offering <S%H819><s%>.

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his trespass offering <S%H817><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, a ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> out of the flock <S%H6629><s%>, with thy estimation <S%H6187><s%>, for a trespass offering <S%H817><s%>, unto the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>:

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for him before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8738><s%> him for any thing <S%H259><s%> of all that he hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in trespassing <S%H819><s%> therein.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8761><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, This is the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>: It is the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, because of the burning <S%H4169><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> all night <S%H3915><s%> unto the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and the fire <S%H784><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be burning <S%H3344><s%> <S%H8714><s%> in it.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall put <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on his linen <S%H906><s%> garment <S%H4055><s%>, and his linen <S%H906><s%> breeches <S%H4370><s%> shall he put <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon his flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and take up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the ashes <S%H1880><s%> which the fire <S%H784><s%> hath consumed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and he shall put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them beside <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he shall put off <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his garments <S%H899><s%>, and put on <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8804><s%> other <S%H312><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, and carry forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the ashes <S%H1880><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> unto a clean <S%H2889><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>.

And the fire <S%H784><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be burning <S%H3344><s%> <S%H8714><s%> in it; it shall not be put out <S%H3518><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8765><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> on it every morning <S%H1242><s%>, and lay the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon it; and he shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thereon the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>.
The fire <S%H784><s%> shall ever <S%H8548><s%> be burning <S%H3344><s%> <S%H8714><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>; it shall never go out <S%H3518><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And this is the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the meat offering <S%H4503><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8685><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he shall take <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8689><s%> of it his handful <S%H7062><s%>, of the flour <S%H5560><s%> of the meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, and of the oil <S%H8081><s%> thereof, and all the frankincense <S%H3828><s%> which is upon the meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, and shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>, even the memorial <S%H234><s%> of it, unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the remainder <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> thereof shall Aharon <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: with matzah <S%H4682><s%> shall it be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>; in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> they shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

It shall not be baken <S%H644><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with leaven <S%H2557><s%>. I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it unto them for their portion <S%H2506><s%> of my offerings made by fire <S%H801><s%>; it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>, as is the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and as the trespass offering <S%H817><s%>.

All the males <S%H2145><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of it. It shall be a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> in your generations <S%H1755><s%> concerning the offerings <S%H801><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>: every one that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them shall be holy <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

This is the offering <S%H7133><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%> and of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, which they shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when he is anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8736><s%>; the tenth part <S%H6224><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> perpetual <S%H8548><s%>, half <S%H4276><s%> of it in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and half <S%H4276><s%> thereof at night <S%H6153><s%>.

In a pan <S%H4227><s%> it shall be made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>; and when it is baken <S%H7246><s%> <S%H8716><s%>, thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it in: and the baken <S%H8601><s%> pieces <S%H6595><s%> of the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> that is anointed <S%H4899><s%> in his stead shall offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it: it is a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; it shall be wholly <S%H3632><s%> burnt <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8714><s%>.
For every meat offering <S%H4503><s%> for the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall be wholly burnt <S%H3632><s%>: it shall not be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, This is the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>: In the place <S%H4725><s%> where the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> is killed <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8735><s%> shall the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> be killed <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8735><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.

The Kohen <S%H3548><s%> that offereth it for sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8764><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it: in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> shall it be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

Whatsoever shall touch <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> thereof shall be holy <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and when there is sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof upon any garment <S%H899><s%>, thou shalt wash <S%H3526><s%> <S%H8762><s%> that whereon it was sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>.

But the earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> wherein it is sodden <S%H1310><s%> <S%H8792><s%> shall be broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: and if it be sodden <S%H1310><s%> <S%H8795><s%> in a brasen <S%H5178><s%> pot <S%H3627><s%>, it shall be both scoured <S%H4838><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, and rinsed <S%H7857><s%> <S%H8795><s%> in water <S%H4325><s%>.
All the males <S%H2145><s%> among the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereof: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.

And no sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, whereof any of the blood <S%H1818><s%> is brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8714><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> to reconcile <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8763><s%> withal in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: it shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%>.
